example.text: Like everyone else in America who has never heard playbyplay of Volleyball on radio, I was in awe of Bob McGregor.
example.note: In all of these instances, a 'play-by-play' is a specific kind of retelling of an event, and is short for 'play-by-play description'. Even when separated, in these instances, the words are understood as a single constituent.
